net.sf.saxon.event
Class HTMLIndenter

java.lang.Object
  net.sf.saxon.event.ProxyReceiver
      net.sf.saxon.event.HTMLIndenter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Receiver, javax.xml.transform.Result
public class HTMLIndenter
extends ProxyReceiver

HTMLIndenter: This ProxyEmitter indents HTML elements, by adding whitespace character data where appropriate. The character data is never added when within an inline element. The string used for indentation defaults to four spaces, but may be set using the indent-chars property
